amendment.description: An amendment numbered 26 printed in Part A of House Report 115-711 to express the sense of Congress that the Corps of Engineers should consider urgently and favorably projects and proposals pending before them for flood control, dam repair, beach erosion, harbor navigation in Puerto Rico, as well as for repair and mitigation required by natural disasters in 2017-2018; and that the Secretary should advance the project for ecosystem restoration at Caño Martin Peña, San Juan, Puerto Rico.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gonzalez-Colon (PR) amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A026) offered by Miss Gonzalez-Colon (PR).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gonzalez-Colon (PR) amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.
